title: Nonprofit Security Grant Program Email Inquries

communications.subject: Colorado Open Records Act Request: Nonprofit Security Grant Program Email Inquries
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Emails sent to  CDPS_DHSEM_NSGPadmin@state.co.us from August 8, 2025 through September 4, 2025.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Russel Neiss

communications.subject: Re: Colorado Open Records Act Request: Nonprofit Security Grant Program Email Inquries
communications.communication:
I will provide a response with any expected fees on Tuesday before COB. 

We do not click or use the links you send to us due to cybersecurity concerns. Info will just be emailed. 

Micki 

Micki Trost, M.A. 

Strategic Communications Director | TLO 

Colorado Division of Homeland Security and Emergency Management 

Micki.Trost@state.co.us | Cell: 303-472-4087 

www.DHSEM.Colorado.gov  | www.COEmergency.com 

Response from iPhone
